elements.name: accident_in_place
elements.title: Did your accident happen in Utah?

elements.name: employer_in_place
elements.title: Is your employer located in Utah?

elements.name: aviso1
elements.visibleIf: {accident_in_place} = true and {employer_in_place} = false or {accident_in_place} = false and {employer_in_place} = true
elements.html:
Important Notice:

Please note that there may be a jurisdictional dispute with your claim; make sure to discuss this issue during your free-attorney consultation.

elements.name: aviso2
elements.html:
Important Notice:

The CVR is currently adapted to valuate Utah injuries only. Please check back in the future as we continue to integrate other states.

choices.text: I understand and want to continue

elements.name: aviso3
elements.html:
Purpose of the UEF


In the state of Utah, there is a fund called the Uninsured Employer's Fund (UEF). The purpose of the UEF is to provide benefits to injured workers whose employers did not carry workers' compensation insurance on the date of the accident and otherwise cannot pay because of insolvency. Discuss this issue with your designated attorney during your free consultation.

elements.name: aviso_4
elements.html: Please note that any hours greater than 40 will be calculated at 1.5 your normal hourly wage pursuant to the Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA).

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_medical_validation
elements.title: Did your doctor confirm the fracture using an MRI, CT scan, or X-Ray?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_percentage
elements.title: What percentage of vertebral fracture did you sustain?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_number_of_fractured
elements.title: How many vertebrae did you fracture?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_previus_surgery
elements.title: Did you have fusion-surgery to treat your fracture?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_how_many_levels
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'HEAD AND NECK' and {type_injury_HEAD_AND_NECK} = 'NECK' and {body_part_NECK} = 'Fracture' and {vertebral_fracture_previus_surgery} = true
elements.title: How many levels did you get fused?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_current_symptom
elements.title: Which of the following symptoms do you currently have?

choices.value: Pain in the arms or shoulders
Inability to turn or bend your neck
Numbness or weakness in the arms, hands or fingers
Lack of coordination in the hands

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_previus_injury
elements.title: Have you ever suffered an injury to the same part of the body before?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_previus_injury_time_elapcep
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'HEAD AND NECK' and {type_injury_HEAD_AND_NECK} = 'NECK' and {body_part_NECK} = 'Fracture' and {vertebral_fracture_previus_injury} = true
elements.title: When?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_previus_injury_lost_work_days
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'HEAD AND NECK' and {type_injury_HEAD_AND_NECK} = 'NECK' and {body_part_NECK} = 'Fracture' and {vertebral_fracture_previus_injury} = true
elements.title: Have you lost time from work in the last 12 months because of your previous injury?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_previus_injury_respective_duty
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'HEAD AND NECK' and {type_injury_HEAD_AND_NECK} = 'NECK' and {body_part_NECK} = 'Fracture' and {vertebral_fracture_previus_injury} = true
elements.title: Were you under restrictive duty because of your previous injury?

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_previus_injury_type_of_restriction
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'HEAD AND NECK' and {type_injury_HEAD_AND_NECK} = 'NECK' and {body_part_NECK} = 'Fracture' and {vertebral_fracture_previus_injury} = true and {vertebral_fracture_previus_injury_respective_duty} = true

elements.name: vertebral_fracture_previus_injury_medical_validation_of_at_least_2_years
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'HEAD AND NECK' and {type_injury_HEAD_AND_NECK} = 'NECK' and {body_part_NECK} = 'Fracture' and {vertebral_fracture_previus_injury} = true
elements.title: During the last 2 years, have you had any diagnostic studies done in the same part of your body? Ex: X-Rays, MRI's, or CT Scans?

Inability to turn or bend your neck
Numbness or weakness in the arms, hands or fingers

elements.name: body_part_FULL_ARM
elements.title: Is your shoulder condition on of the following?

elements.name: arm_shoulder_previus_surgery
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'UPPER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_UPPER_EXTREMITY} = 'Shoulder Condition' and {body_part_FULL_ARM} anyof ['Shoulder Bursitis', 'Rotator cuff tendinitis', 'Tendonitis whit nerve impingement', 'Complete acromionectomy', 'partial rotator cuff tears (global tear)', 'Partial rotator cuff tears']
elements.title: Will you (or did you) need surgery to treat your injury?

choices.text: No I don't know my condition

elements.name: arm_shoulder_pain_after_surgery
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'UPPER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_UPPER_EXTREMITY} = 'Shoulder Condition' and {body_part_FULL_ARM} anyof ['Tendonitis whit nerve impingement', 'Rotator cuff tendinitis', 'Complete acromionectomy', 'partial rotator cuff tears (global tear)', 'Shoulder Bursitis', 'Partial rotator cuff tears'] and {arm_shoulder_previus_surgery} = true
elements.title: After the surgery, were you left with residual pain which prevents you from doing any activities?

choices.text: Yes, but it only prevents me a little.
Yes, it prevents me from doing many activities.

elements.name: arm_elbow_current_symptom
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'UPPER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_UPPER_EXTREMITY} anyof ['Carpal tunnel wrist', 'Carpal tunnel elbow/arm']
elements.title: Do you currently have any of the following symptoms?

choices.value: Numbness of the arm, hand or fingers
Pain on the arm, hand, wrist or fingers
Tingling of the arm, hand, wrist or fingers
Stiffness of the arm, hand, wrist or fingers

elements.name: arm_elbow_wrist_current_symptom_both_arms
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'UPPER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_UPPER_EXTREMITY} anyof ['Carpal tunnel elbow/arm', 'Carpal tunnel wrist'] and {arm_elbow_current_symptom} notempty
elements.title: Are you symptoms in both arms/elbows?

elements.name: arm_elbow_wrist_current_symptom_time_elapcep
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'UPPER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_UPPER_EXTREMITY} anyof ['Carpal tunnel elbow/arm', 'Carpal tunnel wrist'] and {arm_elbow_current_symptom} notempty
elements.title: How long have you had these symptoms?

elements.name: arm_elbow_wrist_current_symptom_without_sleeping
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'UPPER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_UPPER_EXTREMITY} anyof ['Carpal tunnel elbow/arm', 'Carpal tunnel wrist'] and {arm_elbow_current_symptom} notempty
elements.title: Does your symptoms keep you awake at night?

elements.name: arm_elbow_wrist_current_symptom_need_surgery
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'UPPER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_UPPER_EXTREMITY} anyof ['Carpal tunnel elbow/arm', 'Carpal tunnel wrist'] and {arm_elbow_current_symptom} notempty
elements.title: Will you (or did you) need surgery to treat your injury?
elements.otherText: No, I will not need surgery if I will need surgery

elements.name: arm_elbow_wrist_current_symptom_both_arm
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'UPPER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_UPPER_EXTREMITY} anyof ['Carpal tunnel elbow/arm', 'Carpal tunnel wrist'] and {arm_elbow_current_symptom} notempty and {arm_elbow_wrist_current_symptom_need_surgery} anyof ['item1', 'item2']
elements.title: In both arms?

elements.name: type_injury_LOWER_EXTREMITY
elements.title: Select your injury site:

elements.name: body_part_KNEE
elements.title: Affected body part:

elements.name: knee_current_symptom
elements.title: Is your knee-cap condition one of the following?

choices.value: Fractured knee cap without separation of the bones
choices.text: Fractured knee cap without separation of the bones.

choices.value: Fractured knee cap with separation of the bones
choices.text: Fractured knee cap with separation of the bones.

choices.value: Fractured knee cap with separation and delayed union of the bones
choices.text: Fractured knee cap with separation and delayed union of the bones.

choices.value: Total removal of the knee cap
choices.text: Total removal of the knee cap.

choices.value: Partial removal of the knee cap
choices.text: Partial removal of the knee cap.

elements.name: meniscus_current_symptom
elements.title: Is your meniscus condition one of the following?

choices.value: Total removal of the meniscus--Menisctomy  (medial OR lateral)
choices.text: Total removal of the meniscus--Menisctomy  (medial OR lateral)

choices.value: Partial removal of the meniscus--Menisectomy (medial OR lateral
choices.text: Partial removal of the meniscus--Menisectomy (medial OR lateral

choices.value: Total removal of the meniscus--Menisctomy  (medial AND lateral)
choices.text: Total removal of the meniscus--Menisctomy  (medial AND lateral)

choices.value: Partial removal of the meniscus--Menisectomy (medial AND lateral)
choices.text: Partial removal of the meniscus--Menisectomy (medial AND lateral)

elements.name: lca_and_lcl_current_symptom
elements.title: Is your ACL / LCL condition one of the following?

elements.name: shinbone_current_symptom
elements.title: Is your shin/tibia condition one of the following?

choices.value: Fractured shinbone involving the knee joint (without separation of the bones)
choices.text: Fractured shinbone involving the knee joint (without separation of the bones).

choices.value: Fractured shinbone involving the knee joint (with separation of the bones)
choices.text: Fractured shinbone involving the knee joint (with separation of the bones).

choices.value: Surgical treatment to the correct an alignment deformity (Proximal tibial osteotomy)
choices.text: Surgical treatment to the correct an alignment deformity (Proximal tibial osteotomy).

elements.name: femur_current_symptom
elements.title: Is your femur condition one of the following?
choices: Fractured femur without separation of the bones
Fractured femur with separation of the bones

elements.name: knee_replacement_result
elements.title: How would you rate the results of your replacement?

elements.name: shinbone_osteotomy_result
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'LOWER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_LOWER_EXTREMITY} = 'Knee' and {body_part_KNEE} = 'Shin/Tibia' and {shinbone_current_symptom} = 'Surgical treatment to the correct an alignment deformity (Proximal tibial osteotomy)'
elements.title: How would you rate the results of the procedure?

elements.name: shinbone_treated_surgically_discrepancy
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'LOWER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_LOWER_EXTREMITY} = 'Knee' and {body_part_KNEE} = 'Shin/Tibia' and {shinbone_current_symptom} = 'Fractured tibia treated surgically'
elements.title: Did the surgical procedure result in abnormal alingment of your leg?

elements.name: knee_discrepancy
elements.title: Did your injury result in limb-length discrepancy? (one leg shorter than the other)

elements.name: knee_estimated_discrepancy
elements.visibleIf: {injury_information} = 'LOWER EXTREMITIES' and {type_injury_LOWER_EXTREMITY} = 'Knee' and {body_part_KNEE} notempty and {knee_discrepancy} = true
elements.title: What is your estimated limb-length discrepancy?

elements.name: sprained_ankle_instability
